LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_CIWS.label: APT shell
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_Dawnblade.label: Armor piercing shell
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_Kord.label: Uranium APT shell
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Dawnblade.label: Type 85 Multi-Purposed Quick-Firing System
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Dawnblade.description: A highly automated artillery system widely used on small and medium-sized space ships in colonial fleets.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Dawnblade.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Dawnblade
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_GateKeeper.label: GateKeeper
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_GateKeeper.description: A large-caliber multi-barreled autocannon, more known as GAU-8 "Avanger". It is an old and practical design with extremely high rates of fire and devastating suppression capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord.label: kord
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord.verbs.Verb_ShootCE.label: kord
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Kord.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: kord
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Tunguska.label: Tunguska
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Tunguska.description: A weapon system that include two 2A38 autoaconnon and eight missile launchers.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Tunguska.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Tunguska
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek.label: 2B9M Vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek.description: An ancient design of rapid fire indirect artillery suppression, it can fire 4 mortar rounds in one burst.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: 2B9M vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Dawnblade.label: Dawnblade
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Dawnblade.description:
MPQFS-85 "Dawnblade" is an onboard multi-role quick-firing cannon system, it uses drum magazines and automatic revolver loaders to permit a high rate of fire.
the armor plating is removed to allow them to be stational deployed to provide heavy fire support for colony defense.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Dawnblade.comps.CompRefuelabl: Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_GateKeeper.label: GateKeeper
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_GateKeeper.description: A live-fire large-caliber multi-barreled machine gun turret used on spacecraft and maritime ships, with extremely high rates of fire and devastating suppression capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_GateKeeper.comps.CompRefuelab: Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Okhotnik.label: Okhotnik
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Okhotnik.description: An ancient design of a remote control turret, widely used on armored vehicles and mech armor platforms.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Okhotnik.comps.CompRefuelable: Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Tunguska.label: Tunguska
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Tunguska.description: A remote-controlled turret composed of two 2A38 autoaconnon and eight missile launchers. Due to its cheap maintenance and modification costs, it is commonly seen in colonial fleet outposts in rimworlds.
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Tunguska.comps.CompRefuelable: Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Vasilek.label: Vasilek
LanguageData.DMS_Turret_Vasilek.description: An ancient design made for rapid fire indirect artillery suppression, it can fire 4 mortar rounds in one burst.
Cannot shoot: Needs new reinforced barrel
